DataElement.preferredName: Failed First-Line Therapy Negation Autologous Stem Cell Transplantation Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A coded response to questions which are necessary to allow a person to participate in a clinical trail regarding failed therapy and are not candidates for autologous stem cell transplant as outlined in the protocol.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Failed First-Line Therapy Negation Autologous Hematopoietic Stem Cell Transplantation
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Having undergone failure; did not accomplish the intended purpose._The preferred standard treatment for a particular condition._An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction._Stem cell transfer or transplantation in which the patient is his own donor. Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria._

Property.preferredName: Negation Autologous Hematopoietic Stem Cell Transplantation Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria

Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has patient failed front-line
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient failed front-line therapy and declined or are not candidates for autologous stem cell transplant (ASCT) or have failed prior ASCT?
